sn44.9:1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn44.9:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.9:2.1: “Purimani, bho gotama, divasani purimatarani sambahulanam nanatitthiyanam samanabrahmananam paribbajakanam kutuhalasalayam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn44.9:2.2: ‘ayam kho purano kassapo sanghi ceva gani ca ganacariyo ca nato yasassi titthakaro sadhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:2.3: Sopi savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu byakaroti:
sn44.9:2.5: Yopissa savako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu byakaroti:
sn44.9:3.5: ayampi kho ajito kesakambalo sanghi ceva gani ca ganacariyo ca nato yasassi titthakaro sadhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:3.6: Sopi savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu byakaroti:
sn44.9:3.8: Yopissa savako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu byakaroti:
sn44.9:4.1: Ayampi kho samano gotamo sanghi ceva gani ca ganacariyo ca nato yasassi titthakaro sadhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:4.2: Sopi savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu byakaroti:
sn44.9:4.4: Yopissa savako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tanca savakam abbhatitam kalankatam upapattisu na byakaroti:
sn44.9:4.6: Api ca kho nam evam byakaroti:
sn44.9:4.7: ‘acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa’ti.
sn44.9:4.8: Tassa mayham, bho gotama, ahu deva kankha, ahu vicikiccha:
sn44.9:5.2: Kankhaniye ca pana te thane vicikiccha uppanna.
sn44.9:5.3: Saupadanassa khvaham, vaccha, upapattim pannapemi no anupadanassa.
sn44.9:5.4: Seyyathapi, vaccha, aggi saupadano jalati, no anupadano;
sn44.9:5.5: evameva khvaham, vaccha, saupadanassa upapattim pannapemi, no anupadanassa”ti.
sn44.9:6.1: “Yasmim, bho gotama, samaye acci vatena khitta durampi gacchati, imassa pana bhavam gotamo kim upadanasmim pannapeti”ti?
sn44.9:6.2: “Yasmim kho, vaccha, samaye acci vatena khitta durampi gacchati, tamaham vatupadanam pannapemi.
sn44.9:6.3: Vato hissa, vaccha, tasmim samaye upadanam hoti”ti.
sn44.9:6.4: “Yasminca pana, bho gotama, samaye imanca kayam nikkhipati, satto ca annataram kayam anupapanno hoti, imassa pana bhavam gotamo kim upadanasmim pannapeti”ti?
sn44.9:6.5: “Yasmim kho, vaccha, samaye imanca kayam nikkhipati, satto ca annataram kayam anupapanno hoti, tamaham tanhupadanam vadami.
sn44.9:6.6: Tanha hissa, vaccha, tasmim samaye upadanam hoti”ti.
